item.title: Add GitHub Codespaces
item.description:
https://github.com/codespaces - Development environments that are hosted in the cloud. 120-core hours available for free every month.
https://www.gitpod.io - Instant, ready-to-code dev environments for GitHub projects. Free tier includes 50 hours/month.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.pdfmonkey.io/ - Manage PDF templates in a dashboard, call the API with dynamic data, download your PDF. Offers 300 free documents per month.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.openwebhook.io) - Tool for storing third party webhooks and debug them on localhost (ngrok style - - Tool for storing third party webhooks and debug them on localhost (ngrok style). Open source and self-hostable. Free personal domain *username*.github.webhook.store, free public domains *anything*.webhook.store.

item.title: Add AppSpector.com
item.description: https://appspector.com/) - Mission control, for remote iOS/Android/Flutter debugging. Free for small traffic usage (64MB of logs - Mission control, for remote iOS/Android/Flutter debugging. Free for small traffic usage (64MB of logs).

item.title: Added `tarampampam/free-domains`
item.description: https://github.com/tarampampam/free-domains) - Free .is-an.app and .1bt.uk subdomains (wildcards, A, NS, AAAA, CNAME, TXT records are supported - Free .is-an.app and .1bt.uk subdomains (wildcards, A, NS, AAAA, CNAME, TXT records are supported).

item.title: Updated storj plan details.
item.description: https://storj.io/ - Decentralised Private Cloud Storage for Apps and Developers. Free plan provides 1 Project, 150 GB storage, 150 GB bandwidth per month.

item.title: Fixes for Gcore
item.description:
https://gcore.com/ -
https://gcore.com/cdn/ - Global content delivery network, 1 TB and 1 million requests per month free.
https://gcore.com/dns/ - — Free global DNS hosting without limits. Terraform, Certbot, External DNS, Octodns support.
https://gcore.com/dns/ - Free global DNS hosting without limits. Terraform, Certbot, External DNS, Octodns support.

item.title: Add Webhook Store
item.description: https://github.webhook.store) - Tool for storing third party webhooks and debug them on localhost (ngrok style - Tool for storing third party webhooks and debug them on localhost (ngrok style). Open source and self-hostable. Free personal domain *username*.github.webhook.store, free public domains *anything*.webhook.store.

item.title: Add Data Fetcher
item.description: https://datafetcher.com - - Connect Airtable to any application or API with no-code. Postman-like interface for running API requests in Airtable. Pre-built integrations with dozens of apps. The free plan includes 100 runs per month.
